page.title: 05 ENNERDALE CENTRE
page.content: THE ENNERDALE CENTRE IS VERY BIG. IT HAS A VERY BIG CAR-PARK. DOWN STAIRS ARE CHANGING ROOMS AND CLEAN TOILETS. YOU HAVE A LOCKER FOR YOUR CLOTHES. THE BUILDING WAS BUILT IN AUGUST 1984. IN THE CENTRE THERE ARE TWO POOLS, ONE IS A LITTLE POOL FOR BEGINNERS AND IS QUITE SHALLOW THE OTHER ONE IS DEEP FOR SWIMMERS. AT THE CENTRE THERE ARE 2 SAUNA CABINS, 2 PLUNGE BATHS, SHOWERS, FITNESS EQUIPMENT, NORDIC SUNBENCHES, T.V. LOUNGE, REFRESHMENTS AND SPACE-INVADERS. THE PRICE OF ENTRY INTO THE CENTRE IS 60P FOR ADULTS BUT IN THE HOLIDAYS IT'S 30P. THE CHILDREN'S FEE IS 30P BUT IN THE HOLIDAYS IT'S 15P. SOMETIMES SCHOOLS SEND GROUPS OF CHILDREN TO HAVE SWIMMING LESSONS AT THE BATHS. THERE ARE PLANS TO EXTEND THE CENTRE.
